tool_description: Manage Vendors, Request from customers & Events
name: Eventerprise
title: Eventerprise

api_list.name: Get Vendor Sitemap
api_list.description: Get all available vendor site map
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eventerprise1.p.rapidapi.com/vendor/sitemap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eventerprise1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
